content.p: This is my personal homepage at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam where I'm a student Computer Science. My main interests there are theoretical computer science and software technology.
As of september 2005, I'm following the master's program Formal Methods and Software Verification.
During spring 2006, I'm practicum assistent for the course Inleiding Theoretische Informatica. I have some notes available for the course.

In order to do away with the classical view of a computer science student: yes, I have a girlfriend. Her name is Loes and she is an absolute expert in the field of Neuro Science. She likes chocolate and Peking Express.
My friends Alizarin are one of the best uilenbands. They play uilenmusic. I also like Sonic Youth and some other bands, but they are not friends of mine.
I believe in the power of free and open information and software. This includes in particular scientific research. For some online pointers, try my Links page.
